info.author: Nathaniel Smith
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
The goal of this library is to make it as easy to write a novel window manager
as it is to write a program with PyGTK+.  A trivial, compositing, substantially
EWMH-compliant window manager can be written in ~40 lines of code.
info.name: wimpiggy
info.summary: A library for writing window managers, using GTK+
info.html_description: The goal of this library is to make it as easy to write a novel window manager as it is to write a program with PyGTK+. A trivial, compositing, substantially EWMH-compliant window manager can be written in ~40 lines of code.
